subtab.title: Overview
subtab.description: Overview is the main view of My Account experience that shows the customer's credit cards, addresses, etc

overview.customerSupportURL.title: Customer Support URL
overview.customerSupportURL.description: Enter the URL for your customer support page.

overview.homeBanners.title: Home Banners
overview.homeBanners.description: If you configure here it will display it in the index of my account. Ideal for promotions for clients

overview.homeRecentOrdersQuantity.title: Recent Orders quantity to show
overview.homeRecentOrdersQuantity.description: Enter the quantity of recent orders displayed in the My Account Overview page.
